title: Живчик та його друзі
overview: They look like you. Perhaps, they even study at your school or live in the neighboring courtyard. They are outstanding footballers and golfers, almost to dip in five minutes of squadrons, young sculptors and promising cinemas. Exactly this, they are famous gamers, extremists, intellectuals and heart-runners. And most importantly - they know what a sweet friendship is. Get acquainted: Zhyvchyk and his friends.
